name: speedcurve
description: Official SpeedCurve CLI and Node.js API.

scripts.postversion: echo 'Building binaries...' && npm run build && (git push --tags || echo 'Failed to push latest tag. Please do it manually.')
scripts.copy-bin: mkdir -p bin/macos bin/linux bin/windows && mv bin/speedcurve-linux bin/linux/speedcurve && mv bin/speedcurve-macos bin/macos/speedcurve && mv bin/speedcurve-win bin/windows/speedcurve

author: SpeedCurve <support@speedcurve.com> (https://speedcurve.com/)
